WEBHOOK_URL.description:
https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/228383668-Intro-to-Webhooks
Right click channel in Discord -> Intergrations -> Webhooks -> Create Webhook
The webhook URL to send the tweet to - RULE goes to this webhook

BEARER_TOKEN.description:
The bearer token to use for authentication
https://developer.twitter.com/en/portal/dashboard
Fill out your information and accept the developer agreement & policy
Create an app and copy your bearer token
I will remove every rule that the bearer token has access to so you should probably create a new app for this bot.

RULE.description: The rule to use for filtering tweets - RULE goes to WEBHOOK_URL

RULE2.description: The second rule to use for filtering tweets - RULE goes to WEBHOOK_URL2

RULE3.description: The third rule to use for filtering tweets - RULE goes to WEBHOOK_URL3

RULE4.description: The fourth rule to use for filtering tweets - RULE goes to WEBHOOK_URL4

RULE5.description: The fifth rule to use for filtering tweets - RULE goes to WEBHOOK_URL5

ERROR_WEBHOOK.description: The webhook URL to send errors to

SEND_ERRORS.description: Whether to send errors to the error webhook

TWITTER_IMAGE_COLLAGE_API.description: The Twitter image collage API to use
